meanings.definition: Walk or move from place to place.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys ambulating in the park every morning.
meanings.sent2: The patient is ambulating around the hospital corridor.
meanings.sent3: The dog was ambulating happily in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: The river ambulated gently through the valley.
meanings.sent5: The children were ambulating with excitement towards the playground.

meanings.definition: The act of walking or moving from place to place.
meanings.sent1: His ambulating brought a sense of calm to the room.
meanings.sent2: Ambulating is essential for maintaining good health.
meanings.sent3: The ambulating of the ants in a line was quite fascinating.
meanings.sent4: The ambulating of the clouds across the sky was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The ambulating of the crowd towards the stage created a buzz of anticipation.
